Description: Pottery globular pottery stirrup jar, Furumark Shape 171. Handles and spouts missing. Body painted with lustrous red thick and thin bands. Mycenaean flowers (FM 18) in shoulder zone.
Curator's comments: no. 259d, p. 259-260 Karetsou, A. & Andreadaki-Vlasaki, M. (2000). Kriti-Aigyptos: Politismikoi desmoi trion chilietion. Katalogos.
Bibliographic references: Vase / Catalogue of Vases in the British Museum (A986)
Furumark 1941 / The Mycenaean Pottery. Analysis and Classification. (FS 171:36)
